name: Flappy bird (Or and Giulio)
description: Our unique version of flappy bird designed by Or and Giulio. This version of the game contains new features and new designs.  the game mechanics are for more advanced players, the pipes are moving not just forward, but also down and up. The theme of our game is Halloween. Furthermore, there is an Easter egg which you will have to find out yourself, (Hint- valentine day).
